itemHasNoAnalysis: What's currently playing has no analysis

displayMode.label: Display Mode
displayMode.description: Control when to show a song's sections on your playbar. $t(settings.displayMode.expanded)
displayMode.expanded:
Always Shown - Sections will always be shown on your playbar.
Show button to toggle - A button will be shown on your playbar to toggle the sections.
Show only when activated for one song - The toggle button will only activate the sections for the current song.

options.toggleButtonOnce: Show only when activated for one song

showMarkers.label: Show Markers
showMarkers.description: Show a marker for each section change in the song. Markers will not be shown regardless if the progress bar is not wide enough (at least 300px).
